name: Pirating Space
description:
Space pirates have gone on a rampage! You must find these pirates and stop them from taking over planets throughout space.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Z/C/N - shoot

Global Game Jam logo for PICO-8 from https://gist.github.com/MBoffin/0ad8ffc850fb797fe2d90fcc98d81492
